commands.name: az iot hub certificate create
commands.summary: Create/upload an Azure IoT Hub certificate.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub certificate create --hub-name
                              --name
                              --path
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--verified {false, true}]
examples: az iot hub certificate create --hub-name MyIotHub --name MyCertificate --path /certificates/Certificate.pem --verified
az iot hub certificate create --hub-name MyIotHub --name MyCertificate --path /certificates/Certificate.cer
az iot hub certificate create --hub-name MyIotHub --name MyCertificate --path /certificates/Certificate.cer --resource-group MyResourceGroup --subscription MySubscription

commands.name: az iot hub certificate delete
commands.summary: Deletes an Azure IoT Hub certificate.
examples: az iot hub certificate delete --hub-name MyIotHub --name MyCertificate --etag AAAAAAAAAAA=

commands.name: az iot hub certificate generate-verification-code
commands.summary: Generates a verification code for an Azure IoT Hub certificate.
examples: az iot hub certificate generate-verification-code --hub-name MyIotHub --name MyCertificate --etag AAAAAAAAAAA=
az iot hub certificate generate-verification-code --etag AAAAAAAAAAA= --hub-name MyIotHub --name MyCertificate --resource-group MyResourceGroup --subscription MySubscription

commands.name: az iot hub certificate list
commands.summary: Lists all certificates contained within an Azure IoT Hub.
examples: az iot hub certificate list --hub-name MyIotHub

commands.name: az iot hub certificate show
commands.summary: Shows information about a particular Azure IoT Hub certificate.
examples: az iot hub certificate show --hub-name MyIotHub --name MyCertificate
az iot hub certificate show --hub-name MyIotHub --name MyCertificate --resource-group MyResourceGroup --subscription MySubscription

commands.name: az iot hub certificate update
commands.summary: Update an Azure IoT Hub certificate.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub certificate update --etag
                              --name
                              --path
                              [--hub-name]
                              [--ids]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--subscription]
                              [--verified {false, true}]
examples: az iot hub certificate update --hub-name MyIotHub --name MyCertificate --path /certificates/NewCertificate.pem --etag AAAAAAAAAAA=
az iot hub certificate update --hub-name MyIotHub --name MyCertificate --path /certificates/NewCertificate.cer --etag AAAAAAAAAAA=

commands.name: az iot hub certificate verify
commands.summary: Verifies an Azure IoT Hub certificate.
examples: az iot hub certificate verify --hub-name MyIotHub --name MyCertificate --path /certificates/Verification.pem --etag AAAAAAAAAAA=
az iot hub certificate verify --etag AAAAAAAAAAA= --hub-name MyIotHub --name MyCertificate --path /certificates/Verification.pem --resource-group MyResourceGroup --subscription MySubscription
